Welcome! I'm a second-year PhD Candidate in Statistics at the University of Waterloo.
I completed my BMath in 2022 and my MMath in Statistics in 2024, both also at the University of Waterloo.

My research interests involve multistate modelling under complex observation schemes as well as two-phase designs for longitudinal covariate sampling.<br><br>

[Department of Statistics and Actuarial Science](https://uwaterloo.ca/statistics-and-actuarial-science/)<br>
